definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: It has uranium oxide in it.
The low-temperature sintering of UO2 pellets in the partial-pressure oxidization atmosphere is studied.
sentences.chinese: 試驗研究了微氧化氣氛下二氧化鈾芯塊的低溫燒結。

sentences.english: This cup has no uranium oxide.
sentences.chinese: 這個杯子沒含二氧化鈾。

sentences.english: The sintering theory on nuclear fuel pellets is also introduced simply.
sentences.chinese: 並簡要介紹了二氧化鈾核燃料芯塊的燒結理論。
